title: Grab Google’s TV Streamer for Less with this Deal!
description: Get it for less than 90 bucks. The post Grab Google’s TV Streamer for Less with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get it for less than 90 bucks.
text: If you’re looking for a convenient and affordable way to access content streaming platforms without fully investing in a smart TV, then you might want to check out the Google TV Streamer. Originally announced with a hundred-dollar price tag, this deal brings down the Streamer’s price to $84. If you’re curious about its features, the Google TV Streamer comes with support for 4K HDR with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, 32GB of local storage, support for Gemini software features, compatibility with Matter devices, as well as other Google Home-supported hardware products. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
If you’re looking for a convenient and affordable way to access content streaming platforms without fully investing in a smart TV, then you might want to check out the Google TV Streamer. Originally announced with a hundred-dollar price tag, this deal brings down the Streamer’s price to $84.

If you’re curious about its features, the Google TV Streamer comes with support for 4K HDR with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, 32GB of local storage, support for Gemini software features, compatibility with Matter devices, as well as other Google Home-supported hardware products.
